MarketplaceConnectorTitle: Built to work in Odoo seamlessly
MarketplaceConnectorDescription: Install ONLYOFFICE apps for Odoo today from the Odoo Apps Store
FeaturesAIHelper: Multiple editing, formatting, and styling tools. <0>AI helper.</0>
FeaturesCollaboration: <0>Real-time collaboration</0>, review, version history, document comparison, comments and chat. Audio & video calls.
FeaturesFormats: Support for more than <0>50 file formats</0>. Highly compatible with MS Office formats.
FeaturesOpenSourceCode: JWT. Watermarking and password protection. <0>Open-source code</0> available on GitHub.
FeaturesFreeTrial: Scalable Enterprise versions. <0>Free 30-day trial.</0> Individual discounts.
HowToStartStep1: Deploy <0>ONLYOFFICE Docs*</0> on your own server or sign up for <1>ONLYOFFICE Docs Cloud</1>.
HowToStartStep2: Install the required ONLYOFFICE app via the admin panel or from the Odoo Apps Store: <0>Templates app</0> / <1>app for Odoo Community</1> / <2>app for Odoo Enterprise</2>.
ReadDetailedInstructions: Read detailed instructions in the <0>Help Center</0>.
ToBeAbleToUseTheTemplatesApp: *To be able to use the Templates app, please reach out to <0>sales@onlyoffice.com</0> to obtain a special ONLYOFFICE Docs license.
